document.full_text: until raffi torres scored to give the vancouver canucks a 1-0 win over the boston bruins in game one of the stanley cup finals on wednesday, he had missed as many games through suspension as he had playoff goals.
document.title: journeyman torres finds welcome home in vancouver
lines_and_colors: until raffi torres scored to give the vancouver canucks a 1-0 win over the boston bruins in game one of the stanley cup finals on wednesday, he had missed as many games through suspension as he had playoff goals.
